education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

roles.description:
Led a team of 8 engineers building a real-time analytics platform processing 2M+ events per second using Kafka, Flink, and ClickHouse.
Architected microservices migration from monolith, reducing deployment time by 75% and improving system reliability to 99.95% uptime.
Implemented ML-powered anomaly detection system that reduced false alerts by 60% and saved $2M annually in operational costs.
Established engineering best practices including code review guidelines, testing standards, and incident response protocols.
Mentored 5 junior engineers, with 3 promoted to senior roles within 18 months.
roles.title: Staff Software Engineer

roles.description:
Built core features for the company's flagship SaaS product serving 500+ enterprise customers.
Designed and implemented a plugin architecture enabling third-party integrations, increasing platform stickiness by 40%.
Optimized database queries and caching strategies, reducing API response times from 800ms to 120ms average.
roles.title: Senior Software Engineer

roles.description:
Developed high-throughput data pipelines handling 50TB+ daily using Apache Spark and AWS EMR.
Built real-time dashboards with React and D3.js for monitoring critical business metrics.
Contributed to open-source Spark connectors, gaining 1.2k GitHub stars.
roles.title: Software Engineer

roles.description:
Implemented ETL workflows for customer data integration projects.
Developed Python automation scripts reducing manual data processing time by 80%.
Created comprehensive API documentation used by 50+ partner integrations.
roles.title: Junior Software Engineer

projects.description:
An open-source distributed task scheduler built with Go and Redis.

Supports cron expressions, task dependencies, retries with exponential backoff, and horizontal scaling. Used in production by 15+ companies. 3.5k GitHub stars.
projects.name: TaskFlow - Distributed Task Scheduler

projects.description:
A CLI tool for managing Kubernetes deployments across multiple clusters.

Features include diff-based deployment previews, rollback automation, and Slack notifications. Built with Rust for performance.
projects.name: K8s Multi-Cluster Manager

projects.description:
An AI-powered code review assistant that integrates with GitHub PRs.

Uses GPT-4 to analyze code changes, suggest improvements, identify potential bugs, and enforce coding standards automatically.
projects.name: CodeReview AI Bot

projects.description:
A personal finance tracker with ML-based expense categorization.

Built with Next.js, PostgreSQL, and TensorFlow.js. Features include budget alerts, spending trends visualization, and bank sync via Plaid API.
projects.name: Smart Budget Tracker

skills.items: Go, Python, TypeScript, Rust, Java, C++

summary:
Staff engineer with 7+ years of experience building scalable distributed systems and data platforms. Passionate about system design, performance optimization, and developer tooling. Track record of leading teams through complex technical migrations and delivering high-impact projects.
Active open-source contributor with several popular projects. Strong advocate for engineering excellence, mentorship, and building inclusive team cultures. Currently focused on real-time analytics and ML infrastructure.
